segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center of the room, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself towards an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside that cabinet, I can clearly see a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, clearly snagging some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, as if waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely engrossed in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort between the two of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of worry about that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to fall if they aren't careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
